verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>, A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>, when <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1732>David<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%>. Why <S%H1984>boastest<s%> thou thyself in <S%H7451>mischief<s%>, O <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man? the <S%H2617>goodness<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> endureth <S%H3117>continually<s%>.
Thou <S%H157>lovest<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> more than <S%H2896>good<s%>; and <S%H8267>lying<s%> rather than to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

<S%H410>God<s%> shall likewise <S%H5422>destroy<s%> thee for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, he shall take thee <S%H2846>away<s%>, and pluck thee <S%H5255>out<s%> of thy dwelling <S%H168>place<s%>, and root thee <S%H8327>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at him:

Lo, this is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H7760>made<s%> not <S%H430>God<s%> his <S%H4581>strength<s%>; but <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> himself in his <S%H1942>wickedness<s%>.

But I am like a <S%H7488>green<s%> olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, because thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> it: and I will <S%H6960>wait<s%> on thy <S%H8034>name<s%>; for it is <S%H2896>good<s%> before thy <S%H2623>saints<s%>.
